fusion_energy_briefing.completion: Magnetic confinement devices such as tokamak reactors continue to push the triple product and energy confinement time, with stellarators providing complementary research avenues.

material_discovery_update.completion: High-throughput labs rely on combinatorial sputtering libraries combined with automated electrochemical screening; managing phase stability and degradation remains the key risk factor.
